criteria.Points of contact: inside leg, foot of inside leg (optional), side of torso, back of the inside arm (optional), shoulder blade (optional)
criteria.Arm position/grip: arms in fixed position of choice, no hands have contact with the pole

criteria.Points of contact: both hands, the arch of upper foot, bottom foot, calves (optional)
criteria.Leg position: both legs are fully extended in middle split position with lower foot floor based and the arch of the upper foot is in contact with the pole
criteria.Body position: torso is extended away from the pole

criteria.Points of contact: back of inside underarm, side of torso, inside leg, foot (optional)
criteria.Arm position/grip: hand of inside arm holds outside foot, outside arm is in fixed position of choice with no contact with the pole

criteria.Leg position: both legs are extended in front split position

criteria.Points of contact: inside leg, foot of inside leg (optional), side of torso, back of the inside arm (optional), shoulder blade (optional)
criteria.Arm position/grip: arms in fixed position of choice, no hands have contact with the pole

criteria.Points of contact: both hands, both legs, arch of the upper foot, bottom foot
criteria.Leg position: both legs are fully extended in middle split position with lower foot floor based and the arch of the upper foot is in contact with the pole
criteria.Body position: torso is extended away from the pole

criteria.Points of contact: inside leg, side of torso, inside arm, underarm / shoulder blade (optional), outside forearm/wrist (optional)
criteria.Arm position/grip: outside hand wraps around the inside leg at the crook of the knee/thigh, inside arm is fully extended and hand is holding the outside foot
criteria.Leg position: inside leg is in contact with the pole and in position of choice, but is not wrapped around the pole; outside leg is bent backwards

criteria.Points of contact: hand of inside arm, thigh of inside leg, side of torso / lower back
criteria.Arm position/grip: inside hand grips pole, above the inside leg, outside arm is extended in a fixed position of choice
criteria.Leg position: frontal split position with both legs fully extended
criteria.Body position: back arch, facing away from the pole

criteria.Leg position: both legs are fully extended in front split position

criteria.Points of contact: thigh of inside leg, side of torso, back of inside arm
criteria.Arm position/grip: inside arm has contact with the pole. Hand of outside arm is holding opposite leg/foot. No hands have contact with the pole
criteria.Leg position: both legs are fully extended in front split position and the front leg is parallel to the floor
criteria.Body position: upper body is horizontal, facing upwards

criteria.Points of contact: inside leg, side of torso, back of the arm (optional), shoulder blade (optional)
criteria.Arm position/grip: arms in fixed position of choice, no hands have contact with the pole

criteria.Points of contact: hands, legs, ankles (not the arch of the foot)
criteria.Leg position: both legs are fully extended in middle split position
criteria.Body position: upper body must be at a 90° angle to the pole

criteria.Points of contact: inside arm hand, thigh of inside leg, outside arm, underarm (optional), side/ lower back
criteria.Arm position/grip: inside hand grips pole, above the inside leg, outside arm is extended and hand is holding the ankle/shin of the outside leg
criteria.Leg position: split position with inside leg fully extended, outside leg bent backwards

criteria.Points of contact: inside arm hand, thigh of inside leg, side of torso / lower back
criteria.Arm position/grip: inside hand grips pole, above the inside leg, outside arm is extended in a fixed position of choice
criteria.Leg position: frontal split position with both legs fully extended

criteria.Arm position/grip: grip of choice, arms are fully extended
criteria.Leg position: both legs are extended and closed
criteria.Body position: inverted, back arched with hips and both legs parallel to the floor

criteria.Points of contact: underarm of back arm, bicep (optional), back, thigh of inside leg
criteria.Arm position/grip: no hands have contact with the pole, the same hand holds the ankle/shin of back leg and is fully extended, the opposite arm holds front leg
criteria.Leg position: split position with front leg fully extended, back leg bent

criteria.Points of contact: ankles (not the arch of the foot), calves (optional), elbows, torso (optional), biceps/forearms (optional)
criteria.Leg position: both legs fully extended in straddle position with the ankles on the pole
criteria.Body position: upper body must be at a 90° angle to the pole
